sources.autograph: Lucca, Istituto Musicale Boccherini, D.I.33, 'Sonata a quattro no. 10...' (separate parts)
ms_copies_score: Lucca, Istituto Musicale Boccherini, B.I.114, 'Sonata a quattro no. 10...'
ms_copies_parts: Münster, Priesterseminar-Santinibibliothek, Santini HS. 532, 'Opera III, Concerto quarto...'
Naples, Conservatorio. Two copies: 22.2.10, and 22.5.2, 'Quartetto no. 3...'

entries.notes: Published editions: (c. 1785), London, Preston: Op. 10 no. 4; (c. 1790), Paris, Boyer: Op. 10 no. 4. Modern edition: 1953, Milan, Ricordi: Op. 10 no. 4 (pocket score; revised by Enrico Polo).

partial_notes: This page shows one complete quartet entry (G.175). The page header indicates this is part of a section on string quartets with publication information for the series.
